mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (user_id, emoji_id, content) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{emoji_id}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT d.*, e.name as emoji_name, e.emoji_image FROM diary d LEFT JOIN emoji e ON d.emoji_id = e.id WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY d.created_at DESC

SELECT e.id as emoji_id, e.name as emoji_name, e.emoji_image, COUNT(*) as count, ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0 / ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId} )), 1) as percentage FROM diary d JOIN emoji e ON d.emoji_id = e.id WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.emoji_image ORDER BY count DESC
